column2: MEDIA-AT&T; aided U.S. government's Internet spying for yearsSlim's America Movil extends Mexico-U.S. 'borderless' plan to prepay MEXICO CITY
column3: Aug 16 America Movil said on Sunday it removed roaming charges on calls to and data in the United States for 40 million Mexican prepay clients as it gears up to prevent new rival AT&T; Inc. stealing market share on its home turf. column2: UPDATE 3-'Star Wars' land coming to Disney's California
column5: Aug 15 "Star Wars" is being transported from a galaxy far
column6: far away to  California and Florida after Walt Disney Co announced plans for two theme park expansions that will bring the celebrated film franchise to life.
